dcterms:creator: Agrim Gupta
Piotr Dollar
Ross Girshick
dcterms:description: LVIS contains 1.3 million object instances across 120K images and includes 1203 categories. This dataset is known for its heavy long-tail distribution and has been categorized into three groups: frequent, common, and rare, based on the frequency of occurrence.
dcterms:title: LVIS v1.0
